channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description: So most of you all know ive made my own server.... and I'm attemting to learn java and everything else.... my server is up and running succesfully, average around 23 players, but for some reason if im on the computer alot and not letting server just run by itself it freezes or glitches people online... and also me, so therefor to fix it i have to rerun server... which inturn rollsback.... I cant just ::systemupdate cuz im also glitched alot.... can any1 tell me how this can be fixed.... I personally think its because im running the whole thing on my computer wich is only DSL but really i dont know... Will getting a dedi reduce the chances of this happening or do i have to change something in the source?

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @expire expire
item.description:
@expire wrote:

Dedi is the way forward

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Your connection speed isn’t going to effect the local resources the server uses on your PC.

You could try setting the processes CPU priority a bit lower but I don’t know how well that would pan out.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @F_BaBy F BaBy
item.description:
@F_BaBy wrote:

Getting a dedicated will fix your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
